wikitext.*:
{{short description|Third chairman of the Tolkien Society}}
'''Jonathan Simons''' was the third Chairman of [[The Tolkien Society]]. Serving for ten years from 1974 to 1984, Simons is the third-longest-serving Chairman of The Tolkien Society.
